bug.short_desc: youtube-dl cannot find pycrypto, even though it is installed
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: youtube-dl cannot find the pycrypto library, even though the python2-crypto rpm is installed.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 2017.01.31-1.fc25
How reproducible: certain URLs will cause youtube-dl to load pycrypto
Steps to Reproduce: 1. youtube-dl "https://video.vice.com/en_us/video/meet-the-masterminds-behind-las-new-jerry-maguire-video-store/5881151ed670a17f4b6a9fde?Latest_from_VICE=1"
Actual results: ERROR: pycrypto not found. Please install it.
Expected results: loads the python2-crypto library.
Additional info:

Not sure, what's the problem. Cannot reproduce here (with youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.fc25.noarch):
$ youtube-dl --proxy=http://somewhereinus 'https://video.vice.com/en_us/video/meet-the-masterminds-behind-las-new-jerry-maguire-video-store/5881151ed670a17f4b6a9fde?Latest_from_VICE=1' [Vice] meet-the-masterminds-behind-las-new-jerry-maguire-video-store: Downloading webpage [Vice] 5881151ed670a17f4b6a9fde: Downloading JSON metadata [uplynk:preplay] 188f9410901e413f94b829d36e1f19fa: Downloading JSON metadata [uplynk:preplay] 188f9410901e413f94b829d36e1f19fa: Downloading m3u8 information [uplynk:preplay] 188f9410901e413f94b829d36e1f19fa: Downloading JSON metadata [hlsnative] Downloading m3u8 manifest [hlsnative] Total fragments: 132 [download] Destination: Meet the Masterminds Behind LA's New 'Jerry Maguire' Video Store-5881151ed670a17f4b6a9fde.mp4 [download] 100% of 276.53MiB in 11:03 [ffmpeg] Fixing malformated aac bitstream in "Meet the Masterminds Behind LA's New 'Jerry Maguire' Video Store-5881151ed670a17f4b6a9fde.mp4" $
youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-629e058c5e
youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-185162e843
youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2759025f5b
youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-9aec471979

AFAICS the error message is misleading, since it does not seem to depend on whether pycrypto is available but on some other problem maybe: https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/blob/master/youtube_dl/downloader/hls.py#L69

youtube-dl-2017.02.16-1.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
